text:
21 Feb 2025

Nice place to have a gathering. We had our breakfast here and we were the first customer. If the shop can have some sound absorbing materials it will be great.

We had a mee siam with fried chicken and a meehoon fish soup. The fried topping on the soup impacted the overall taste and made it oily. The mee siam tastes good with the chicken also ok.

Nice place to revisit. The waitress was also very friendly.

Top notch environment, food, drinks and portion, highly recommended for everyone to have breakfast, lunch and tea time here.

Try their Kopi-peng, Ayam Penyet and Mee Hoon Kuey, that‚Äôs signature! üòãüòãüòã

enjoyed a warm breakfast. the soup mee hun kueh was delightful, and the quiet, relaxing environment made it the perfect place to unwind.

The friendly lady boss, along with the restaurant‚Äôs cleanliness and good hygiene, further enhanced the experience, recommended this spot for a satisfying meal.

We came here as we see high rating for the cafe and it did not disappoint at all.
The food, service and ambience are all 5 stars. I will start recommending this to my friends who are visiting nearby

I had an outstanding dining experience at Q Mom 1938 Coffee House in Medini, Iskandar Puteri! The delicious local foods were a true delight, each dish bursting with authentic flavors. The quiet and relaxing dining environment made it the perfect place to unwind. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, adding to the overall pleasant experience. The restaurant was very clean and maintained high standards of hygiene. All of this at a very reasonable price - definitely deserving of five stars! ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
